titleStmt.title: Cedrus Britanica et laurus regia sive rex & corona a poetical hexameron. Shewing, 1. The invention, 2. The distinction, 3. The designation, 4. The necessity, 5. The dignity, 6. The perpetuity. Of crownes.

notesStmt.note: Title words "1. The invention, ... perpetuity." are gathered by a reversed right brace.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library, Washington, D.C.
